extension.news:
v.2.0.0~alpha3 - changed default skin to make it easier to manage
v.2.0.0~alpha2 - added option to use built in select dialog instead of custom menu - added ability to support skin specific custom select menu - PVR recordings are now categorized as auto_pvr_tv during auto switch - changed general logic for auto switching
v.2.0.0~alpha1 - added more granular control over notifications - added option to have select menu show only for certain media types - fix for crash in service when changing settings - reorganized settings - substantial rewrite to eliminate need for service to call main addon via executebuiltin - code refactoring
